about_the_game:
Red Chaos is a modern RTS inspired by classic real-time strategy games. Two unique, well-balanced factions face off in intense battles where base-building, resource management, and commanding units will shape you into either a powerful commander of the Iron Hand or a fearless general of the Resistance.

Engage in ground and aerial warfare, utilize upgrades, special abilities, and devastating superweapons to dominate the battlefield. The focus is on large-scale battles where armies clash. Build a mighty base or strike fast to outmaneuver your opponent. With multiple tactical and strategic approaches, the choice is yours.

Red Chaos features an extensive multiplayer mode, offering countless hours of fun against both friends and strangers worldwide. Compete in ranked matches to climb the leaderboard and prove your skills.

The Skirmish mode is highly customizable, featuring four difficulty levels and adjustable AI behavior. Set your opponent to be aggressive or defensive, and even restrict them to specific unit types, such as air-only battles. Once you get the hang of it, facing different enemies under unique conditions becomes a thrilling challenge.

To ensure a smooth start, Red Chaos includes a short tutorial to familiarize you with the controls. Additionally, a set of missions will gradually unlock new buildings and units while guiding you through objectives that test your strategic abilities.

But true mastery is only achieved on the battlefield against real opponents.

After a devastating world war ravaged the Earth, one place remained untouched by pollution and destruction: Untainted Garden, also known as the Green Land.

When the warlords realized the full extent of the devastation, they agreed to a ceasefire and began discussions on establishing a new world order. The Untainted Garden was chosen as the site for the new world government, and there, they built a formidable fortress.

Refugees, seeking a fresh start, fled to this sanctuary, only to be betrayed by politicians who established the Iron Hand regime. Instead of creating a just society, the powerful grew stronger while the civilian population was oppressed and abandoned. This oppression and the growing sense of despair fueled resentment and unrest among the people.

Amidst this discontent, former generals, soldiers, and rebellious citizens formed a resistance. United by a common cause, they vowed to fight against the Iron Hand and free the land from its tyrannical rule. Though their resources were limited, they used their military experience and skills to build a formidable fighting force.

The resistance worked to gain the people's support and expose the injustices of the Iron Hand. They sought to recruit civilians to strengthen their ranks, but they had to proceed with caution, as the Iron Hand controlled a fortified city and possessed vast resources.

The struggle between the Resistance and the Iron Hand became a war of sacrifice, deception, and strategic warfare. The people were not only fighting against the physical might of the Iron Hand but also against the suppression of their ideals and values.

Red Chaos builds upon the legacy of classic real-time strategy games, offering two unique factions.

The Iron Hand is a tyrannical regime seeking total control over the Untainted Garden. Armed with advanced technology, a superior air force, and powerful tanks like the Titan, they aim to achieve victory through overwhelming firepower or hold their ground with robust defensive structures if a direct assault fails.

The Resistance, on the other hand, relies on deception and unconventional tactics. Their arsenal includes units like the Flying Rhino, a flying bus that drops high-explosive barrels on enemies, or the Tube, an underground tunnel system that allows for rapid movement between locations, alongside other modified vehicles designed for mobility and surprise attacks.

Each faction offers a completely different playstyle. It’s up to you to decide the fate of the war.

We at Squarecut Games have built a great team that works together to perfect our project.

Like many others, we, the members of Squarecut Games Studio, were shaped by the unprecedented rise of the video game industry and recognized the love for the RTS genre as early as the 90s, which has accompanied us to this day and encouraged us to develop RED CHAOS.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 2-core 1.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560X or better
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: MacBook, MacBook Pro or iMac 2014 or later
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: 4-core 2.9 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 5500 XT or eGPU
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: MacBook, MacBook Pro or iMac 2014 or later

movies.name: Red Chaos - The Strict Order  - Double Tank Activated

name: Red Chaos - The Strict Order

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit or better
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 970 GPU or AMD Radeon RX 570 GPU with 4GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: The last world war didn't end conflict. The Iron Hand tyrannizes people, as the Resistance fights for liberation. In the resulting conflict high tech and brute force face off against guerrillas with unconventional tactics, leading to Red Chaos: A modern take on classic real-time strategy games.
